name: sysdesk
description: Sistema de Atendimento BR SISTEMAS - Full Stack Application

scripts.docker:exec:db: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec mariadb mysql -u root -p
scripts.prisma:generate: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend npm run prisma:generate
scripts.prisma:migrate: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend npm run prisma:migrate
scripts.prisma:studio: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend npm run prisma:studio
scripts.install:all: npm run backend:install && npm run frontend:install
scripts.test:backend: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend npm test
scripts.test:frontend: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec frontend npm test
scripts.lint:backend: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend npm run lint
scripts.lint:frontend: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec frontend npm run lint
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.format:backend: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend npm run format
scripts.format:frontend: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec frontend npm run format

author: BR SISTEMAS
